pageProduct.name: Organic Formulations Mandarin & Rose Shampoo 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Mandarin and Rose Geranium Shampoo is a hydrating shampoo designed for dry hair and scalp.

Common Uses

Hydrating for Dry Hair

Ingredients

Ingredients: Aqua, Guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, P-Anisic acid, Aloe Vera Juice (Aloe barbadenis), Coco glucoside, Organic Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia chinesis)*, Organic Sunflower Oil (Helianthus annuss)*, Organic Wheatgerm oil (Triticum vulgare)*, Parfum (Natural preservative), Tocopherol, Organic Argan Oil (Argania spinosa)*, Organic Sweet Almond oil (Prunus dulcis)*, Rose Geranium Essential Oil (Pelargonium graveolens), Organic Rose Otto Essential Oil (Rosa damascena)*, Organic Mandarin Red Essential Oil (Citrus Reticulata Rosso)*, Lavender Essential Oil (Lavendula angustifolia), From Organic Agriculture* 32% Organic of Total 99% Natural Origin of total

Directions

Wet hair. Massage shampoo into the scalp in a circular motion. Rinse and repeat if necessary.
